title: Build.A.Lot.Pc.DeLEGiON
description:
ANOTHER GAME RELEASE BY .~DeLEGiON~                                             
 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
                    

         Title.........Build-a-lot

         Company.......Big fish games

         Release.Date..2007

         Disc[s].......1 Iso

         Protection....Fixed

         Game.type.....Sim

         Size..........7rars + 1 nfo + 1 sfv + 1 jpg = 10 files 90.6 mbs

         Url...........http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/2095/build-a-lot/index.html

         Language......English
         


         DESCRIPTION
         ~~~~~~~~~~~
         Become a real estate mogul and take over the housing market as you
         construct, upgrade and sell houses for huge profits! You can flip 
         houses for quick cash or sit back and watch the rental income pile
         up. Travel to scenic towns and perform special tasks for the local 
         mayors. Buy blue prints of new buildings to build bigger and better
         neighborhoods! Can you build an ice rink for the Olympics? A new 
         cinema for the local movie star? Find out in the new strategy game,
         Build-a-lot!

       * Hours of gameplay!
       * Improve 8 neighborhoods.
       * Buy new blue prints.


         
         System Requirements
         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         OS: Windows ME/2000/XP/VISTA
         CPU: 600MHz or faster Processor
         RAM: 128 MB
